testsuite.name: tests.home.MyTestHomePage
testsuite.system-out: STEP - Launch Browser Successfully... STEP - Navigate to Casa39 English Website Home Page. STEP - Accepting Cookies... STEP - Search for a Available Product as Zucchetti Closer Wall Mounted Showerhead Z94250 Selecting product from suggested item list... Click - Zucchetti Closer Wall Mounted Showerhead Z94250 Verified - Zucchetti Closer Wall Mounted Showerhead Z94250 as Searched Product is Correctly Displayed STEP - Select Quantity and add to cart Click - Add to Cart Verified - Zucchetti Closer Wall Mounted Showerhead Z94250 Verified - has been added to your cart STEP - Navigate to Shopping Cart Page Click - View cart Verified - Page Title is Displayed Set - DISCOUNT Click - APPLY DISCOUNT Verified - The coupon code "DISCOUNT" is not valid. STEP - Clear Shopping Cart Click - Clear Shopping Cart Verified - You have no items in your shopping cart. STEP - Clicking CASA39 Logo to Return On Home Page... Click - STEP - Closing Browser Successfully...
